anya-e0806n2:2_4: tathāhi vuttiyaṁ-‘ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti ettakameva pakativisesanavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:2_5: pañcikāyantu tabbisesana vasena ca paccayatthavisesanavasena ca attho dassito,
anya-e0806n2:2_8: tathā byācikkhissāma “yadi panettha vutyānukūlā pañcikā bhaveyya paccayatthapakkho jahitabbo siyāti ‘te…pe…
anya-e0806n2:2_10: yojaniya’nti ca etesaṁ jahitabbatāya bahupāṭhavilopo āpajjati,
anya-e0806n2:2_11: yadi pana pañcikānukūlā vutti bhaveyya vuttiyaṁ kiñcimattaṁ pakkhipitabba mattameva siyāti bahuvilopāpatti
anya-e0806n2:2_12: (na) hotīti etesaṁ dvedve honti ekāne katthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti vuttiyā bhavitabba”nti,
anya-e0806n2:2_14: sutte ‘dvedvekānekesu nāmasmā’ti vuttattā ‘ekānekesū’ti idaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ vā yujjati
anya-e0806n2:3_3: tathāhyekādīsu bhavantā pakativāccānamevekattādiabyati rittaatthamattādīrūpānaṁ jotakā syādayo kathamekattādīsu
anya-e0806n2:3_5: tathā itthiṇādippaccayādīnampi pana pakativisesānupādānepi yato dhātvādi vāccottho natthi,
anya-e0806n2:3_7: dhātutyādyantehi tyādyanta vāccehi (potthake) na honte vittipaccayā,
anya-e0806n2:3_10: yadetampakativisesanaṁ tadāpi sāmatthiyeneva ekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā tajjotanāya bhavantā syādayo
anya-e0806n2:3_11: kathamaññattha honti asambhavāti ekānekesu dvedveti labbhati,
anya-e0806n2:3_12: athavā sarūpena avuttampi sāmatthiyenekānekatthesūti gammamānaṁ vuttameva hotīti katvā‘tecā’tiādikaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:3_13: ekānekesu vattamānato nāmasmāti kimatthaṁ asatvabhūtāya kiriyāyekattādisambandhābhāvā kriyatthāca tyādīhi
anya-e0806n2:3_14: yevekattādīnaṁ vuttattā tyādyantehi ca na bhaveyyunti payojanantaramāha-‘yampanā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:3_16: Tathāhi saṅkhyākammādayo nāma vāccassa dabbassa dhammo sakattho-pasajjano ca saddo dabbeyeva vattate…
anya-e0806n2:3_18: tattha dabbavācinā saddena dabbadhammānamabbhantarīkaraṇanti nāyuttametaṁ nāmena pañcannamabhidhānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:5_0: Samavetaṁ vade liṅgaṁ, saṅkhyaṁ kammādikammi ceti.
anya-e0806n2:6_1: tenāti yena pañcako nāmattho adhippeto ekādīsu ca atthesu jo-tanīyesu syādayo vidhiyissanti tena,
anya-e0806n2:6_3: sabhāvatotyādikassāyamadhippāyo “yadyapi syādayo ekānekesu honti tathāpi ekādayo saṅkhyāya paricchinne atthe vattanti na saṅkhyāmatte,
anya-e0806n2:6_4: saṅkhyāya sambhavābhāvā saṅkhyeye bhavatīti na saṅkhyāpi syādīnamattho”ti (na) kevalaṁ sakattha dabbādiyeva syādīnamattho na bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:6_6: anena saṅkhyā vibhatyattho catukko nāmatthotyayampakkho nirākato pañcako nāmatthoti dassane saṅkhyākammādīnaṁ vibhattiyo jotikā honti,
anya-e0806n2:6_7: tiko nāmatthoti dassane tu saṅkhyākammādayo vibhattivāccā honti,
anya-e0806n2:6_9: tattha sakattho visesananti sarūpādi yaṁ kiñci visesanattena vattumicchitaṁ taṁ sakattho nāmati attho,
anya-e0806n2:10_0: Bhāvābhāvasabhāvo yo, so guṇo nigguṇo mato.
anya-e0806n2:13_0: Idāni sarūpādino visesanassa sakatthabhāvaṁ jātyādivisesassa dabbabhāvañca dassetuṁ ‘tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:13_2: ettha pana goti jātimattavācini gosadde payutte gosaddo jātimattamāheti so jātiṁ viseseti nāma.
anya-e0806n2:13_3: Yaṭṭhiādisaddehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā upacārato gahitāti yaṭṭhiādidabbehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā purisā visesīyantīti
anya-e0806n2:13_5: yaṭṭhiyopavesayāti yaṭṭhisaddavacanīya yaṭṭhidabbavisiṭṭhe purise pavesayāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:13_8: sambandhanimittoti sambandho nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ paccayappavattiyā assa paccayassa soti samāso,
anya-e0806n2:13_9: ettha hi daṇḍo assa atthīti assāti sāmino purisassa saṁsaṅkhātadaṇḍādidabbena sahayo sassāmisambandho,
anya-e0806n2:13_12: (kiri)yā padatthassāpi visesanattena sakatthabhāvo jātipadatthādīnaṁ vutta ṭhāneyeva vattabboti pācakoti
anya-e0806n2:13_13: ettha kiriyākārakasambandhasaṅkhātaṁ parābhimataṁ sakatthampi paropadesenopadisitukāmo idha sambandhasakatthassa
anya-e0806n2:13_15: Nāmasabhāvena viññāyamānaṁ pañcamaṁ nāmasaṅkhātamatthaṁ dabbapadatthena saṅgahetvā jātiguṇakiriyādabbānīti hi catubbidho nāmattho,
anya-e0806n2:13_16: nāmampi anvattharuḷhivasena duvidhaṁ pumitthinapuṁsaka liṅgavasena tividhampi catubbidhaṁ hoti…
anya-e0806n2:13_18: te vā attani nāmetīti iminā kāraṇena.
anya-e0806n2:13_26: atoti ādesa bhavanato phalaṁ dassitaṁ na siyāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:13_27: vuttiyaṁ ‘evaṁ kumārī kumāriyo’tiādīsu evanti yathā pulliṅge ikārantato syādīnamudāharaṇamanādesatthaṁ vuttaṁ evamitthiyampi anākārantatoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:13_29: vacaneti iminā pāṇiniyānaṁ vibhattisaññāvidhāyakassa suttantarassa atthibhāvaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:13_35: kathampanetesu syādīsu vibhajīyaticcassa vākyatthāssānugamo yenevaṁ vuccaticcāsaṅkiya yena yathā ca vibhajīyati tamupadassento āha-‘tathā hi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:15_0: Vuttiyaṁ kattukiriyāyāti kattusādyatāya taṁ sambandhiniyā kattukammaṭṭhāyapi duvidhāya kiriyāya,
anya-e0806n2:15_1: anekatthattā dhātūnaṁ karoti ettha sambandhanatthoti āha-‘karīyati abhisambandhīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:15_4: sabbakārakānampi pana kiriyāsambandha sabbhāvepi kiriyābhisambandhīyamānatteneva yaṁ vattumicchitaṁ tadeva kammaṁ viññeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:15_5: kattādi kattu kiriyāyābhisambandhīyamānattepi kattādittavacanicchāyeva kammaṁ na hoti…
anya-e0806n2:15_7: evaṁ sabbakārakānampi kārakantarappattiyaṁ tadabhāvo yathāyogaṁ vattabbo,
anya-e0806n2:15_8: vākyekadesenetyanena “dvedvekā”dino vākyassa “kamme dutiyā”iccādino ca ekavākyattaṁ sūceti,
anya-e0806n2:15_9: pakaraṇassa mahāvākyarūpattā vippakaṭṭhānipi vākyāni ākaṅkhādisabhāve aññamaññasambandhānubhavanenekavākyabhāvampaṭīpajjante, vuttī hi–
anya-e0806n2:18_2: tena yadyapi tyādinopi dvinnaṁ pūraṇiyā dutiyāti sakkā voharituṁ,
anya-e0806n2:18_3: tathāpi syādīnaṁ dukeyeva dutiyātatiyā ruḷhīti natyādīnaṁ dukāni dutiyādisaddena gayhanti,
anya-e0806n2:24_0: Satī-satī vā pakati, na yattha pariṇāminī,
anya-e0806n2:26_0: Asantaṁ jāyate yaṁ vā, yaṁ santamappakāsati,
anya-e0806n2:28_0: Ayamettha attho “kaṭavikārassa kāsasaṅkhātā vijjamānā pakati pariṇāminī kaṭavikārampati pariṇamantī yatthappayoge na nissīyate…
anya-e0806n2:28_1: kaṭaṁ karotītettha kevalamatthāvagamamattassa vattumicchitattā kāseti asuyyamānattā ca,
anya-e0806n2:28_2: pakatiyā tu suyya mānatte vikāriyaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n2:28_4: taṇḍule odanaṁ pacatīti dvayattho karoti pacati ca,
anya-e0806n2:28_5: tasmā kāse karoti taṇḍule pacatīti vikārīyati,
anya-e0806n2:28_6: kaṭaṁ karoti odanampacatīti nibbattī yatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:28_7: asatī vā pakati avijjamānattāyeva yattha na nissīyate…
anya-e0806n2:28_8: (yathā) (potthake) ( ) saṁyogaṁ janayati vibhāgamuppādayatīti saṁyogavibhāgānaṁ kassāpi pakatiyā avikārattā
anya-e0806n2:28_10: tamevambhūtamanissitapakatikaṁ avijjamāna (pakati) kaṁ vā kāriyaṁ nibbattikammaṁ nāmāti eko,
anya-e0806n2:28_15: santaṁ vijjamānameva vā kevalamappakāsitapubbaṁ yaṁ uppattiyā abhibyattiyā vā pakāsati,
anya-e0806n2:28_18: tadevaṁ kesañci matena anissitapakatikaṁ avijjamānapakatikanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampi aññesammatena
anya-e0806n2:28_19: asantaṁ jāyamānaṁ santamappakāsamānanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampītisabbampi aṭṭhitapubbameva jāyatītyasato
anya-e0806n2:31_0: Kiñci vikāriyaṁ kammaṁ pakatiyā kāraṇassa ucchedena sambhūtaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:31_1: yathā kaṭṭhaṁ bhasmaṁ karotīti kaṭṭhassāccantaparāvatti parāvattiyā (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:31_3: yathā suvaṇṇaṁ kaṭakaṁ keyuraṁ vā karotīti evaṁ dvīdhā sā vikati hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:33_0: Dassanā vānumānā vā, sā pattīti pakittitā.
anya-e0806n2:34_0: Yattha kiriyākato kiriyāsampādito viseso atisayo koci nāvagamyate nappatīyate dassanā vā paccakkhappamāṇena
anya-e0806n2:34_1: anumānappamāṇena vā yathā nibbattivikatīnamatisayo paccakkhānumānā vagamanīyo,
anya-e0806n2:34_7: devadattaṁ roseti pasādayati veti visiṭṭhamukhavaṇṇādikāriyānumeyyattā rosādino,
anya-e0806n2:34_8: evaṁ yattha na visesasiddhi api tu pattimattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:34_11: kathañcarahi asantassa santassa (potthake) pattikammassa kiñci (akaronta)ssa kārakattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:34_12: na hi kiñci akarontaṁ kārakambhavitumarahatīti uccate-
anya-e0806n2:37_0: Atra daṭṭhuṁ sakkā iti dassane khamatā ābhāsopagamo visayattopagamo visayattopagamanaṁ byatti ceti evamādayo
anya-e0806n2:37_3: ādiccaṁ passatīti ettha hi ādicco daṭṭhuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0806n2:37_4: tatova so dissati abhibyattiñcopayātīti dassanakiriyānipphādakatthenāssa kārakattamupapajjate,
anya-e0806n2:37_8: pattikammampi kiriyāsambandharūpenāsantameva pacchā tathā bhavatīti nibbattiyevāti saccaṁ-
anya-e0806n2:39_0: Tatra yampetaṁ ghaṭate, yathā patīti saddatthāvattānato.
anya-e0806n2:40_2: kato kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo papponti niyamābhāvā,
anya-e0806n2:40_3: tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n2:40_4: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi kaṭādīsu
anya-e0806n2:40_5: kammādīsu dutiyādayo siyunti pāṇiniyā “kamme dutiyā”ccādīsu (2-3-2) “anabhihite”ti (2-3-1) vacanamadhikaronti,
anya-e0806n2:40_6: veyyattiyāyeva dutiyādīnappasaṅgepi tannissayabhūte-kattādyatthe jotanāyābhihitesu dutiyādayo siyuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:40_9: tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu
anya-e0806n2:40_12: tatra tasmiṁ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṁ codyaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n2:40_16: dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:40_19: pañcake tike cā bhihitakammādinissaye sekattādīsu dutiyādippattimāsaṅkāvasena dassetvā catukkavādīnampi pakkhamubbhāviya pariharituṁ ‘yadiccā’dimāha,
anya-e0806n2:40_20: ayantesamadhippāyo “yadesā saṅkhyā pāṭipadikattho tappaṭipajjane kammādayo vibhattivacanīyā,
anya-e0806n2:40_23: yadā panāyaṁ pakkho ‘saṅkhyā vibhattivacanīyā’ti tadā “kamme dutiyā” tyevamādayo niddesā visayasandassanamattāyeva veditabbā”ti,
anya-e0806n2:40_27: na vijjate byatirittaṁ byatireko bhedo yassa taṁ abyatirittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:40_29: saddatthato sakatthato abyatirittaṁ atthamattaṁ atthasāmaññaṁ yassa odanādisaddassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n2:41_1: tathāpi tehi abhihitepyevameva daṭṭhabbanti nidassento āha-‘eva’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:41_2: kara-karaṇe karīyitthāti kato‘kto bhāvakammesu’ti (5-56) kamme kto,
anya-e0806n2:41_3: satikoti ettha kītoti kammatthe “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120) iko,
anya-e0806n2:41_5: evañca dhuhi kimekamudāharaṇaṁ dattamācariyene tyato āha- ‘udāharaṇa’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:41_6: anabhihiteti vacanaṁ vināpīti vacanaṁ vinā evāti avadhāraṇe-apisaddo,
anya-e0806n2:41_10: evañca panettha dutiyādīnamabhihite pasaṅgābhāvo jānitabbo “paccate odano,
anya-e0806n2:41_11: kato kaṭoccādopi yadi dutiyādayo siyuṁ paṭhamāvidhānassāvakāso na bhaveyya tato sāmatthiyānabhihiteyeva
anya-e0806n2:41_14: na nuca paṭhamāyākārakamavakāso rukkho pilakkhoti rukkho pilakkhoti kriyāpadaṁ na sūyateti vibhatyantarassappatti
anya-e0806n2:41_15: maññatebhassāpadīpa kimidamuccate akārakanti yadya kārakaṁ nedampayogamarahati tato yattha visesakiriyāna
anya-e0806n2:41_16: massavanaṁ tattha padatthasahacaritāya sattāya patītiyā ‘rukkho atthi pilakkho atthī’ti apekkhīyatīti
anya-e0806n2:41_17: kārakattaṁ rukkhādīna mattheveti attheveti ññataṁ vatthuṁ paraṁ patipādayituṁ saddo payujjate ññaṇañca
anya-e0806n2:41_18: satoiti yatra kriyāpadantarassa appayogo tatra ussaggato sattā patītitutthīti kriyāpadānusaṅgara kattari
anya-e0806n2:41_20: na ca uccaṁ nīcaṁtyadhikaraṇavācitte vācikā nipātassa atthītyanena natthi sambandhoti uccamatthītyādheyyasseva
anya-e0806n2:41_21: kattuttaṁ nādhārassātya kārakattamādhārassātyavakāso-tthi paṭhamāyāti “paṭhamāvidhā nassāvakāso na bhaveyyā”ti
anya-e0806n2:41_22: yathāvutto-yaṁ hetu asiddhoti ca sakkā vattuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_0: Yañcāti casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye aparampi kiñci vattabbamatthīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_2: yadetthāna bhihitādhikāro natthi tadā yathā ‘kato kaṭo’ccatrattena kammassābhihitattā dutiyā na hoti
anya-e0806n2:42_3: tathā ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭasaddato uppannāya dutiyāya (vipulādigatassa) kammassā bhihitattā
anya-e0806n2:42_5: tato tyādi tabbādiṇādisamāsehi kammassāna bhihitattamattevāti vipulādīhipi dutiyāvidhānasaṅkhātaṁ anabhihite”ti
anya-e0806n2:42_6: (2-3-1) anabhihita vacanassa adhikāre yañca phalaṁ cintayatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_8: paccekaṁ karotyabhisambandhatāyāti ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ karoti dassanīyaṁ karoti’ccevaṁ paccekaṁ paccekaṁ karotissābhisambandhatāyāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_10: evaṁ maññate-“kaṭaṁ karomīti pavatto vipulaṁ karomī dassaniyaṁ karomīti ca pavattovāti vipulādīnampi paccekaṁ kammatā attheva,
anya-e0806n2:42_11: tatthekassābhidhāne parekassa sukhamavalokayantīti tadabhidhānāyapi dutiyā bhavissatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:42_12: pakārantarāvatāro nācariye noparodhitoti tampi panettha dassayissāma-“kaṭasaddā uppajjamānā dutiyā kaṭajāti kammamabhihitavatī,
anya-e0806n2:42_17: kaṭaṁ karoti vipulo dassanīyoti hi vuccamāne vipulādayo kattusamānādhikaraṇatāyeva patīyeyyuṁ tasmā kaṭasaddasāmānādhikaraṇyampaṭipādayatā
anya-e0806n2:42_21: pappotīti kaṭa kamme-bhidhāniye (kato) ti ktappaccayassa katattā udārādito karotyabhisambandhā dutiyā pappotīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_26: Hotu kāmaṁ udārāditopi vuttena vidhinā paṭhamā,
anya-e0806n2:42_28: antobhūto antogadho nāmassa saddassa attho yasmiṁ kammalakkhaṇattheso attho kammalakkhaṇo abhihito kathito sampanno sampajjatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_29: nanu ‘kato kaṭo’ccādo sabhāvato sabbakammavuttiyā antobhūtanāmatthavuttiyā cātthamatte hoti sabbattha
anya-e0806n2:42_30: paṭhamāti ‘kaṭaṁ karoti uḷāraṁ sobhanaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭāditopi uppannāya dutiyāya kammassābhihitattā
anya-e0806n2:42_31: uḷārādīhi paṭhamāppasaṅgo siyāti abhihitābhidhānappasaṅgopagataṁ codanaṁ manasi nidhāyāha-‘kaṭādisaddo
anya-e0806n2:43_0: “Katturicchitatama”ntyanena (1-4-49) kattuno kiriyāya sambandhi tumiṭṭhatamaṁ tasmiṁ icchitatame kammasaññaṁ
anya-e0806n2:43_1: vidhāya nibbatyādikesutīsu kammesu dutiyā vidhīyate pāṇinīyehi,
anya-e0806n2:43_3: odanaṁ pacati gāvumpayo dohatityādo(hi) odanādyatthā pacanādikiriyārabbhateti odanapayādīnamicchitatamattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:43_6: puna payādinipphattinimittaṁ yaṁkiñci dohanādikiriyā yuttaṁ karaṇādirūpena akathitaṁ gavādikamicchitaṁ kārakaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:43_7: tatthāpi “akathitañcā”ti (1-4-51) kammasaññaṁ vidhāya teneva dutiyā vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:46_6: guṇasaddenettha padhānasādhanaṁ dhammādikaṁ vattumicchitaṁ padhānasādhanañhi kiriyāyopakārakamupakāriyaṁ padhānabhūtaṁ kiriyamapekkhiya guṇo bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:46_9: upayujjamānañca taṁ payopabhuticeti visesanasamāsaṁ katvā upayujjamānapayoppabhutino nimittanti chaṭṭhīsamāso,
anya-e0806n2:46_16: Pāṇiniyehi “tathā yuttañcānicchitaṁ” (1-4-50) iccanena kammasaññaṁ vidhāya “kamme dutiyā” (2-3-2) tyaneneva dutiyā vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:49_1: tatoyeva‘gāmaṁ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappatī’tyatra nevicchitanānicchitassapi rukkhamūlassa kamma saññā
anya-e0806n2:49_7: rukkhamūlopasappanantu pasaṅgāgatanti rukkhamūlānampi kiriyābhisambandho attheva, atrāpi-
anya-e0806n2:52_10: atha “adhisīṭṭhāsānaṁ kammaṁ”tyādinā (1-4-46) tena tena kammasaññaṁ vidhāya ‘paṭhaviṁ adhisessatī’ti
anya-e0806n2:52_11: ādo (tattha) tattha “kamme dutiyā”ti (2-3-2) dutiyā vidhīyate tehi tehi sattha kārehi,
anya-e0806n2:52_12: sabbatthevettha lokassa kammavacanicchāti kamenetaṁññasaññāpubbakaṁ kammamupadassento āha-‘adhipubba’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:52_13: yāya vatticchāya dutiyā siyā tāya vatticchāya kammatā kathaṁhināmāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:52_16: tatthevaṁ kiṁ bhavato manasi dosadhijambhanenāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:52_17: dhammeti etthāpi evaṁ saddaṁ yojetvā attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:52_22: evaṁsaddasamānatthattā tathā saddassa tadatthānusāreneva viññāyatīti tathāsaddassa attho visuṁ na vutto,
anya-e0806n2:52_25: pānatthācāratthadhātusambandhī yo nadyādi ko ādhāro so pānācāravāyevāti āha- ‘pānatthācāratthānaṁ dhātūnamādhāre’ti,
anya-e0806n2:52_28: patiparīhi bhāgecetyavasiddhāti iminā patisaddassa dhātunā ayuttataṁ dasseti…
anya-e0806n2:54_0: Yadā kāladdhānamiccādinā‘māsamāsate kosaṁ sayati’ccādo akammakehipi yoge kālabhāvaddhadesānaṁ parehi kammattamanuññātanti ca,
anya-e0806n2:54_1: yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṁ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n2:54_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_4: māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṁ māsādiyogo viya kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti,
anya-e0806n2:54_5: na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati,
anya-e0806n2:54_7: Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṁ sākallena sambandhābhāvā accantasaṁyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā.
anya-e0806n2:54_8: Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_9: accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya sambandhamāha,
anya-e0806n2:54_12: upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṁ upalakkheti,
anya-e0806n2:54_15: idha pana sattami yampattāyaṁ sattamyatthe bāhulakena “kamme dutiyā”cceva dutiyāppatti.
anya-e0806n2:55_5: Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṁ gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe’ti,
anya-e0806n2:55_6: abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno bhinnānaṁ taṁsamavetānaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe kāladdhānāni,
anya-e0806n2:55_12: isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena gammamānaṁ kiriyaṁ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti,
anya-e0806n2:55_17: muttasaṁsayenedaṁ samānanti mutto saṁsayo yasmiṁ avadhyādo tenetaṁ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n2:55_18: Vuttiyaṁ abhimatāti “sattamī pañcamiyo kārakamajjhe”ti (2-3-7) vacanena sattamīpañcamiyo papañcattamabhimatā,
anya-e0806n2:55_19: dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:55_21: sakasakakārakavacanicchāyevāti hi idaṁ bāhullaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:55_22: dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n2:55_23: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhati upāttavisayo-yamavadhi,
anya-e0806n2:55_24: kose vijjhatīti kose ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n2:57_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n2:57_2: cattasamāse gatyādīnaṁ visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā tehi paraṁ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate,
anya-e0806n2:57_3: atha sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṁ kattāti kathaṁ viññāyati yena ‘payojje kattarī’ti
anya-e0806n2:57_6: takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:57_7: kiriyākaraṇe samattho nāma kattāvāti āha-‘soca kattā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:57_8: Dutiyāya siddhāyāti vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā “kamme dutiyā”ti sutteneva kamme dutiyāya siddhāya.
anya-e0806n2:57_12: payojjo kattā na kammaṁ tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_15: niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_17: tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno
anya-e0806n2:57_18: yadi kammaṁ na hoti aññathā kiṁ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī”ti (attho)
anya-e0806n2:57_25: nanu vacanappayojanaṁ dassayatā vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_27: heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati,
anya-e0806n2:57_28: sambandhivacanattā etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti
anya-e0806n2:57_29: ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:57_31: nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti “yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi kammattampasajjati,
anya-e0806n2:57_32: tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:57_33: abhimatāti “gatibuddhyā”di (1-4-52) suttena payojjassa kattuno kammasaññaṁ vidhāya tasmiṁ payojjedutiyābhimatā,
anya-e0806n2:57_35: payojetīti asmiṁ uddese tadā kathaṁ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṁ
anya-e0806n2:57_36: uddese vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_39: yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:59_1: sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:59_7: abhivadanamabhivādo taṁ karotīti “dhātvatthenāmasmī”ti (5-12) imhi nāmadhātu ‘abhivādi’tisutte niddiṭṭhoti āha-‘abhivādismā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:62_0: “Vahissāniyantuke”ti gaṇasutte ayamettho “vahissadhātussa payojje kattari niyanturahite dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:62_1: niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṁ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-‘kiriyaṅga’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:62_3: niyametvāti ekasmiṁ karaṇīye kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0806n2:62_4: vāhayati bhāraṁ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṁ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā,
anya-e0806n2:62_5: vāhayati bhāraṁ balībadde iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n2:63_0: “Bhikkhissāhiṁsāya”nti gaṇasuttassāyamattho “bhakkhissāhiṁsatthassa payojje kattari dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:63_1: atha kathamettha hiṁsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṁsā hi cetanāvati sambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:63_7: tathā sati sammatameve-ttho-padassetvā gantabbaṁ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā
anya-e0806n2:63_9: paratthānubaddhakicchaṁ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya maññanti,
anya-e0806n2:63_11: taṁtaṁ mataññuno vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṁ te cetthāvatāraṁ cetthakāraṁ (potthake) labheyyuṁ
anya-e0806n2:63_12: etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati kamena daḷhaṁ pasādaṁ
anya-e0806n2:63_14: evamevaṁ tattha tattha taṁtaṁbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi tadanusāreneva tantaṁpayojanaṁ veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:64_0: Duhādīnaṁ tyevamādo amhākamparamagurunā ratanamatipañcikālaṅkārādikārena nānākārasāratthavedaveditu vedāvedita
anya-e0806n2:64_11: tena kammadvayayuttānaṁ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti yojanā.
anya-e0806n2:64_12: Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṁ gāvaṁ avarundhīyate vajaṁ go’iccādīnaṁ pariggaho,
anya-e0806n2:64_14: Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti ettha kathaṁ payojjattasambhavoti āha-‘purise’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:64_15: yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā purisova tu gamanakiriyaṁ nipphādeti,
anya-e0806n2:64_17: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṁ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya kattubyapadese kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:64_18: tathāhi gāmaṁ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:65_0: “Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n2:66_0: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n2:72_0: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n2:74_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:74_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti,
anya-e0806n2:74_2: hā devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n2:74_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nā landa(nti
anya-e0806n2:74_4: tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā na dutiyāti tenāyogā,
anya-e0806n2:74_5: yesañhi taṁmajjhaṁ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_6: athavābbhupagatepi taṁyoge taṁsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_7: atrāpi chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti,
anya-e0806n2:74_9: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n2:74_12: tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa.
anya-e0806n2:74_13: Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:76_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:76_10: janakassāpyatra lakkhaṇattena gahaṇe payojanaṁ “anunā” (2-10) iccatra daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:77_0: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṁ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n2:79_0: Ayamettha attho “ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_1: chaṭṭhī viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_2: nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī,
anya-e0806n2:79_3: kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī”ti tamupadassetumāha-‘aññe tvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:79_5: rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṁ pattikiriyāya patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:79_6: tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:79_8: nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā kathaṁ jotīyatīti āha-‘lakkhaṇatthoca visayabhāvenā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:79_13: devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-‘mātuyā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:79_14: mātā ca itthambhūte pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena,
anya-e0806n2:79_15: tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto,
anya-e0806n2:79_17: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-‘yvāya’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:79_20: evaṁ maññate “kiñcāpi so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate,
anya-e0806n2:79_21: tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)…
anya-e0806n2:79_22: saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotanato”ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:79_23: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya esaṁ rukkhānaṁ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:79_24: rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:79_25: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato pare sambandhīti,
anya-e0806n2:79_29: dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṁ vicāreretabbaṁvitattiyā
anya-e0806n2:79_31: lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṁ jotetumasamatthattā vicchāya jotanāya dvibbavacanaṁ kattabbamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n2:83_2: hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve saccakiriyāya kathaṁ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-‘yaṁ sakimpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:83_3: ettha hi lakkhaṇaṁ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā,
anya-e0806n2:83_5: yaṁ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:83_6: yathā’api bhavaṁ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṁ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:83_10: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ katvā pucchati ‘api’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n2:83_11: atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:83_13: tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi…
anya-e0806n2:83_18: saccakiriyamanu pāvassīti tu hetumhi lakkhaṇe-pavādavippaṭisedhe sati pubbavippaṭisedhena dutiyā bhavati.
anya-e0806n2:85_0: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:87_3: kathaṁ tena yuttattaṁ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:87_9: hīnukkaṭṭhasambandho pana atisāyanādikāya kāyaci kiriyāya katoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:89_2: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-‘navine’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_5: Dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa adhikassāpyupasaddena yogā tatopi kasmā na sattamītyāha-‘adhikamhātvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_6: yathā ekāyeva vibhattiyā ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotitattā vijjusaṅkhātalakkhiyā sattamyabhāvo,
anya-e0806n2:89_7: evamidhā pīti pubbe vuttasamādhimatidisanto āha-‘lakkhitā viya sattamya bhāvo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:91_5: diṭṭhanto-panītottho sukhena paṭipattuṁ sakkāti pasiddhamanuvadiyamānamappasiddhañca vidhīyamānaṁ diṭṭhantamāha-‘yathā yo kuṇḍalī so devadatto’ti,
anya-e0806n2:91_12: Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko taṁ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:91_14: adhibrahmadatte pañcālāti brahmadattassa pañcālā santakā sāmino (potthake) ti attho,
anya-e0806n2:93_2: pacatyodanaṁ devadattoccādo kamme patiṭṭhitaṁ kiriyaṁ karotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:93_3: karotīti ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-yaṁ kattu vohāroti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:93_4: kenaci payujjamānopi sake kamme sayameva padhānattamanubhavatīti‘payutto vā padhānabhāvenā’ti vuttaṁ hoti cettha-
anya-e0806n2:94_0: Padhānatāya yo kattu, kammaṭṭhaṁ kurute kriyaṁ;
anya-e0806n2:95_0: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṁ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n2:96_2: nanu kiriyā-yamabyavadhānena karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena,
anya-e0806n2:96_3: tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṁ kiriyaṁ kattāva karoti mukhyabhāvenāparetvamukhyabhāvenāti vuccate-
anya-e0806n2:97_2: pavivekeca kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā,
anya-e0806n2:99_0: Ayamettha attho “kattuno sakāsā aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca,
anya-e0806n2:99_1: tathāhi pasiddhakaraṇasabhāvopi pharasu kattāyattavuttitāyādhikaraṇambha vati‘pharasumhi ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:99_3: kattuno kiriyāya ālocanena dassanena ca ‘devadatto atthi bhavati vijjatī’ti vuthabbhūtassānena ālocanena
anya-e0806n2:99_6: iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā”ti, punapi-
anya-e0806n2:102_1: kasmāti ce yato kāraṇā atthe attano abhidheyyesaddassa vutti paṭipatti anādinā micchābhyāsenabhavati tasmā thālyādīnantiādi pakataṁ,
anya-e0806n2:102_4: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n2:103_0: Aññathe vāggi saṁsaggā, dāhaṁ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n2:105_0: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṁ kattuttaṁ hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n2:110_1: saddāvāti sadde tedhammā hontu vā mā vā kattusambandhiyathāvuttadhammavacanicchāya saddatova kattā patīyate,
anya-e0806n2:110_5: atoyevāccantamasantopi aṅkuro jananakiriyāya kattā bhavati ‘aṅkuro jāyate’ti,
anya-e0806n2:114_2: iminā idaṁ dīpeti “karaṇabyapadesāya suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-yaṁ karaṇavohāro”ti,
anya-e0806n2:117_0: Tattha yaṁvattumicchitaṁtyādinā idaṁ dasseti-“na vatthuto kiñci karaṇaṁ nāma atthi,
anya-e0806n2:117_3: pasiddhādhikaraṇānampi tadanuttādivisesasambhave thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṁ kārakaṁ viññeyya”nti,
anya-e0806n2:117_8: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṁ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā chaṭṭhī siyā,
anya-e0806n2:117_9: samena dhāvatītyādo tu kiriyāya vijjamānattepi kammattaṁ vattumicchitanti dutiyā siyā,
anya-e0806n2:117_12: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṁ vaggaṁ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca katvā kiṇātītyatthoti
anya-e0806n2:117_22: yaṁ yasmā aññagotto gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:117_23: nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca
anya-e0806n2:117_25: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti-“dvidoṇādisaddena hi na gayhupagaṁ vatthumuccati,
anya-e0806n2:117_26: tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṁ mūlaṁ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro”ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṁ dassetuṁ ‘taṁ yathe’ccādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:119_1: udāharaṇamattaṁ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṁ ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:119_2: puttena sahāgatotiādīsu āgamanādikiriyampaṭicca dve kattāro padhānāppadhānavasena,
anya-e0806n2:119_3: tesu padhāne kāriyasampaccayañāyena vā bahulaṁvacanena vā padhāne kattari paccayo,
anya-e0806n2:119_7: tulyopi kiriyāsambandhe pitāputtānaṁ pitātra padhānaṁ saddacoditattā,
anya-e0806n2:119_12: tathā vidhā hi saddassa satti yato piturevātra kiriyā sambandhaṁ sakkoti paṭipādetuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:119_17: (Yadi) vuttanayena tatiyā siddhā ‘siddhe satyārambho niyamāya vā vikappāya vā’ na cettha niyamo,
anya-e0806n2:119_22: sāmatthiyāti bhedādhiṭṭhānattā sahatthayogassa puttassāpi kiriyābhisambandho viññāyati kathamaññathā sahatthayogo siyāti iminā attha balena.
anya-e0806n2:119_24: Pariyāyatthanti parito ayanti avagacchanti atthamaneneti pariyāyo attho payojanaṁ yassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n2:119_26: atoyeva vināpi sahasaddappayogaṁ tappariyāyappayogaṁ vā sahatthena yoge vidhānato asatyapi sahādisaddappayoge
anya-e0806n2:119_27: yattha tadattho gamyate tatthāpi bhavatyeva tatiyā…
anya-e0806n2:119_31: Visesānupādānatoti “sahayutte-ppadhāne”ti (2-3-19) pāṇinīya sutte viya appadhāneti visesassānupādānato.
anya-e0806n2:121_2: atthe kāriyassāsambhavā taṁvācīhi vibhattīti maññamānena yaṁvivaraṇaṁ kataṁ ‘lakkhaṇe vattamānato’ti,
anya-e0806n2:121_7: Kañcippaṇaramāpannassa lakkhaṇe tatiyā yathā siyā ‘rukkhampati vijjotana’miccatra lakkhaṇamatte mā bhavīti
anya-e0806n2:121_19: rukkhampati vijjotananti ettha kassaci itthambhūtassābhāvā itthambhūtaggahaṇe payojanaṁ na dissati tannivattanato,
anya-e0806n2:121_20: rukkhampati vijjotateti etthatu itthambhūtassa vijjusaṅkhātassa atthassa sabbhāvā tatiyāppattiyaṁ taṁnivattiyā
anya-e0806n2:121_21: yathāvuttaṁ ñāyamantarena nāññaṁ kiñci paṭisaraṇamatthīti saññāpayamāha-‘avassa’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_27: dutiyāvidhānasāmatthiyāti “patiparīhi bhāge cā”ti (2-9) kasmā na sakkāti āha-‘atthi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_29: Atha kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assāti ādo tatiyā kasmā na siyā tyāha-‘kamaṇḍalu’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_30: kamaṇḍalussa setassa ca upalakkhaṇa bhāvenānupādānatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:121_34: Yenāṅgena vikatena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate tato tatiyā yathāsiyāti parehi “yenāṅgavikāro”ti (2-3-20) āraddhaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:121_36: tattha yasaddena vikatāvayavo hetuttena niddiṭṭho aṅgasaddo ca samudāyavacano upātto tenāha-‘yeneccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_37: nanuca kāṇādīnaṁ niyataguṇīnamabhidhāyittā akkhisaddassa payogo na yutto byāvattiyābhāvāti,
anya-e0806n2:121_46: akkhi(nāti) hi vutte sandeho siyā ‘kimassa vattumicchita’nti tato kāṇoti vuccate,
anya-e0806n2:121_49: akkhikāṇamassetyādo kasmā na siyāti āsaṅkiya‘kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assā’tyatra yo vutto parihāro,
anya-e0806n2:123_1: Ekatra hi diṭṭhasāmatthiyottho taṁyoggatāya kāriya (ma)karontopi hetu vuccate sati saha kārinyasati ca vidhurappaccayo papā(ta) to,
anya-e0806n2:125_1: parāṅgabhūteti parassa bandhattā(dino) vidhānā yāṅgabhūte jaḷattādihetumhīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:125_12: nanu ‘to pañcamyā”ti (4-95) suttena taddhitapaccayantassa kathaṁ pañcamyantatā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘pañcaminiddese’ iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:125_14: vā pañcamiyā vidhānato tatiyārūpenapi bhavitabbanti codanamanasi nidhāya pañcamyu dāharaṇeyeva kāraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:129_0: Nāmabhūtehīti sabbādīsu keci kesañci yadi nāmāni siyuṁ tehi,
anya-e0806n2:131_1: pūjānuggahakāmatta mantarena sammāpadānaṁ na sambhavatīti āha-‘pūjā’ iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:131_11: rukkhādikaṁ taṁ sampadānaṁ vibhāgena dassetumāha-‘tattha hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:133_0: Payojanapariyāye atthasadde sati idanti payojanaṁ parāmaṭṭhuṁ sakkāti ‘tasseda’ntiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:133_3: attha kathanametanti iminā vacanicchāya metissaṁ natthi samāsoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:133_4: viggahe vāsmimimasmāyeva nipātanā samāso daṭṭhabbo,so vikatisaṅkhāto attho,
anya-e0806n2:133_10: tesaṁ sambandho tadatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ tadatthabhāvo nāmāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:133_11: hetu hetumantabhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:133_12: padhānāvacchedaguṇasmāti vidhīyamānattena padhānassa purisassa ācchedakā visesakā guṇā,
anya-e0806n2:133_15: yadā upādīyateti vatvā upādīyamānappakāraṁ diṭṭhantena phuṭayitumāha-‘yathā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:133_16: yūpo nimittaṁ yassa dāruno taṁ tathā vuttaṁ nāññanimittanti yadā nimityavacchedakattenupādīyate tadā nimittasaddatova catutthī sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:133_18: nimittanimittīnaṁ sambandhassa abhimukhabhāvena tattheva nimitte pavattīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:134_0: Piṇiyamānā kiṁ saddādivacanīyā paro sāduādiko yo-ttho so añño kattā yassa so aññakattuko-bhilāso,
anya-e0806n2:134_1: abhilāso rucīti iminā dityādyanekatthantopi rucisaddo-bhilāse ruḷhova gayhatīti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:134_2: sā ruci attho-bhidheyyo yesaṁ bhe tadatthā,
anya-e0806n2:134_4: iminā ca kiñcāpi rucirayaṁ yassuppajjateyo vā tassā janako,
anya-e0806n2:134_7: ajanakopi so tāya saṁsattoti tasseva piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññā,
anya-e0806n2:134_10: iminā ca udāharaṇānamasamāna rūpattameva catutthīvidhāne kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:134_11: aññathā chaṭṭhīyeva tehipi vidhīyeyya kāraṇāsambhavā kāraṇasabbhāvā hi dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:134_16: natthi añño kattā yassā sā anaññakattukā ruci,
anya-e0806n2:134_17: bhāya ruciyā sambandhino piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññaṁ ye pana icchantīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:134_21: uppattiyā ādhāro uppatyādhāro‘devadattāya rocate’ccādo devadattādiṁ upalakkhetīti uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:134_22: ettha ruciyā uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇameva vacananti sāvadhāraṇa mattho daṭṭhabbo…
anya-e0806n2:134_24: tena piṇiya mānavacanamabhilāsassa aññakattukatāsandassanaparaṁ na hotīti byavacchinnambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:134_29: atippasaṅgocāti “kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesī”tiādo tavāti anabhimataṭṭhānappattica.
anya-e0806n2:135_5: Suttantarena (taṁ taṁ) niyamena niyamitānaṁ tesaṁtesaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ vidhāya catutthī vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n2:135_15: teneva vakkhati-‘yassa sambandhiṁ subhāsubhaṁ pucchati nemittiko’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_16: yocānukūlattambha jatīti iminā idaṁ dasseti “patipubbako āpubbakoca suṇoti abbhupagame paṭijānaneca vattate,
anya-e0806n2:135_17: yadāyamabbhupagamo patthanā pubbato bhavati tadā patthanāya kattu patthayituno catutthī rūpambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:135_18: yadātvapatthatampi kevalamānukūlyena vattamānaṁdisvā deyyamabbhupagacchanti idamidaṁ vodassāmāti kopissasāmāti
anya-e0806n2:135_21: so hi “abbhupagamo nāma parena patthitassa bhavati tattha patthayituyeva catutthīrūpambhavatī”ti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:135_22: pubbassākiriyāya yo kattāti vedavākyena vihitathutikakaraṇa saṅkhātāya ussāhānujānanato pubbabhūtāya kiriyāya yo kattā hotā potā ca,
anya-e0806n2:135_25: rūpasāmyato pana tādatthiyatthasabbhāvāca yathāyogaṁ tādatthha catutthīpi na virujjhati,
anya-e0806n2:135_35: duhanādayo kopappabhavā nānantarena te sambhavantīti dūbhādayopyudāhaṭā “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasse aparajjhāmi,
anya-e0806n2:135_44: thutikaraṇassa kattubhūtā hotāpotāro ussāhanānujānanānaṁ kammaṁ hotīti āha-‘paccanupubbassa giṇātissa kamme’ti.
anya-e0806n2:135_50: Ettha pana tathā paṭisedhābhāvepi bahulādhikārato ‘na taṁ nāvammaññe nataṁ annammaññe’ccādi bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:135_53: etthaca yadā tiṇāditopi khikaṁsīyate tadā nindāvagamo,
anya-e0806n2:135_54: tattha ca niyogatova nañpayogo ñāthānupa pattiyāti sappaṭisedhamudāhaṭaṁ ‘na maññamāno’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_56: nañpayogeva niyogato nindāvagamā tiṇanti kammeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:135_57: athavā satīpi nindāvagame vacanicchāto savisayeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:135_59: catutthiṁ icchantīti mattāyāti ettha catutthiṁ icchanti,
anya-e0806n2:135_61: caṇḍassa kukkurassātiādisutte “atha so”ti pāṭhassa vijjamānattā ‘bhiyyoso mattāyā’ti ettha sokāro punaruttoti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:137_0: Avadhīyate visilissate etasmātyavadhi, avapubbāya dhādhātuto avadhimhi“dādhātvī”ti (5-45) i.
anya-e0806n2:140_0: Etthāyamattho “yatokutocipi attho kiñci vatthuavadhīyate saṁyogassa vā kiriyānimittaṁ gamanadānādikiriyāpubbaṁ
anya-e0806n2:140_1: visilissate sayaṁ vā apeti aññena vā visuṁ karīyate,
anya-e0806n2:140_2: tamevaṁvidhaṁ calañcā calañca visilesaparicchedabhūtaṁ padatthamavadhiṁ vadanti budhā tabbiduno”ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_0: Tattha niddiṭṭhā vacanopanītā kiriyā visayo yattha so niddiṭṭha visayo vadhi,
anya-e0806n2:143_2: upāttājjhāhaṭā kiriyā visayo yattha so upāttavisayo,
anya-e0806n2:143_5: anumeyyā kiriyā visayo yattha so anumeyyavisayo,
anya-e0806n2:143_8: atoyevetthāyameva saññā paripphuṭā viññāyatīti na kācidiha saññā paribhāsīyate byāmohakāriṇī,
anya-e0806n2:143_9: athāvadhismāti vuccamāne ‘padatthāvadhismā’ti kuto-vasīyate yenevaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katantyāsaṅkiyāha-padāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n2:143_10: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṁ dīpeti “na kevalaṁ kāyasaṁsaggapubbakova visileso,
anya-e0806n2:143_13: tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:143_15: dhuvaṁ me maraṇanti vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate,
anya-e0806n2:143_16: tathā corehi tāyatityādo yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṁ corā passeyyuṁ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto
anya-e0806n2:143_17: te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_18: parehi pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato,
anya-e0806n2:143_19: idha pana sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_20: bhītibhāyanatthānanti bhīti tāyanānaṁ attho yesaṁ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_21: nanu bhītyatthānaṁ payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti,
anya-e0806n2:143_23: tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-‘yo bhayahetu’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_59: maññamāno sissā ahaṁ kathannāma byavahito bhavāmīti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_66: “antaradhāneti kiṁ core na didikkhatī”ti paccudāhaṭaṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n2:143_69: tra hi yo core na didikkhati tehi attano adassanamicchatīti na antaradhānanimittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_74: Icchatiggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ adassanicchāyaṁ sati satyapi dassane yathāsiyā”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_89: pakatisaddena kāraṇamattaṁ gahitaṁparehi ‘puttā pamodā jāyate’ccādo puttāditopi yathā siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_100: navattu paṭibaddhāti lokavacanicchamullaṅgiya ahameva vadāmīti sakajjhāsayena vadanto vattā,
anya-e0806n2:143_104: paṭhamato upalabbhatīti atthakathanena janyattho-tra na sambhavatīti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:143_117: tena pariyāyappayogepi bhavatī”ti aññehi byākhyātattā āha-‘bhinno devadattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_118: ārāsaddassa dūratthattā āsavakkhayato ārā dūro bhavatī(tyattho u) pādīyatetyāha‘ārāsaddo dūrattho’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_119: niddissamānapaṭiyogīti ‘devadatto sūro’ti niddissamānassa kassaci yo so dutiyo,
anya-e0806n2:143_121: Disādesakālavuttīnaṁ disāsaddattena pariggahato āha‘disā desakālavācīnaṁ yoge’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_130: pāsāda māruyha pekkhati āsane upavisitvā pekkhatīti idaṁ visayo padassanaṁ pubbaṁ yassāti kiriyāvisesane samāso,
anya-e0806n2:143_131: vakkhamānasabbadassanesupi pāsādato-pakkamanalesasabbhāvā pāsādo (yevā) vadhirūpena vattumiṭṭhoti dassetumāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_132: apakkamati tato taṁ dassananti tato pāsādato tassa daṭṭhuno dassanaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ apakkamatyapayātītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:143_135: te hyevamācikkhanti “indriyesu cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhugoḷakato-ccantasukhumabhāvena nikkhamma visālībhavantaṁ
anya-e0806n2:143_148: indriyādhiṭṭhānampatte visaye viññāṇalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ karonti sīlenāti pattakārīni,
anya-e0806n2:143_161: manasikārādītiādisaddena cakkhuto cakkhunā (potthake) abhedo rūpāpāthagamo ca dassito,
anya-e0806n2:143_177: taṁ yuttā pañcamiyutthā parassāddhassa paṭhamā ca sattamī ca vattabbā”ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_180: atra hi yadā rājagahassa yojanañcābhedo vattumicchīyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_183: Tathāhi pāṭaliputtasmā sattasu yojanesu sati rājagahaṁbhavatītyayamattho patīyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_185: Sambandhe chaṭṭhīti iminā “taṁ yuttā kāle sattamī vattabbā”ti (2-3-28vā) vacanampaṭikkhipati.
anya-e0806n2:143_190: guṇe hetumhīti guṇapadatthe hetubhūte “guṇe”ti (2-21) pañcamīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_193: yadātviccādinā paresaṁ viya karaṇe visuṁ vidhāne payojanaṁ natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:143_196: samānādhikaraṇattenāti ca ‘rañño puriso’tyādo asamānādhikaraṇassāpi visesanattadassanato vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_197: samānādhikaraṇattena visesanabhāvo cāssa thokaguṇānvite calane vattamāno thokasaddo asattavacanova visesananti,
anya-e0806n2:143_201: avadhisambandhalakkhaṇāti avadhisambandhāva lakkhaṇaṁ nimittamāsaṁ pañcamīchaṭṭhīnaṁ tā tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n2:143_203: evaṁ carahi taṁtaṁ kārakavacanicchāyamaññāpi vibhattiyo kasmā nappayujjeyyunti āha-‘lokiyā cetthā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_204: ettha vibhattīnaṁ niyame lokiyā eva vacanicchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_206: “pañcamyadhikaraṇeca” (2-3-36) iccatra ca kārena dūranti katthehi sattamī ca vuttā pāṭi padikatthe sārasaṅgahakārādīhi,
anya-e0806n2:143_207: tadakkhippa aññāpadesena paṭikkhipituṁ kecityādi yaṁ vuttaṁ vuttiyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_215: na hi tasmiṁ ṭhīyate’ti visuṁ sambandho vaseyo.
anya-e0806n2:143_223: tathāhyatrāyaṁ mahābhāssa pāṭho “dūrantikatthehi pañcamīvidhāne taṁyuttā pañcamīpaṭisedho vattabbo dūrā gāmassa,
anya-e0806n2:145_0: Guruto kupitā dūrā,bhābyaṁ dūrā ca dassuhiti.
anya-e0806n2:146_3: dūrasmāvasathāti āvasathassa dūreti atthohi bhāssapadīpe keyyaṭo,
anya-e0806n2:146_4: paṭhamo puriso yassa so paṭhamapuriso bhavati “dūrantikā”di (2-6-5) kaccāyanasutte suddhādiyogopi saṅgahito,
anya-e0806n2:146_6: “dhātunāmānamupasaggayogādīsvapica” iti (2-6-2) sutte caggahaṇato pabhutiyogo ca gahito,
anya-e0806n2:148_0: Nanu phuṭova tesaṁ sālādīnaṁ yogoti kimettha pañhena kassa panetehi yogo’tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vajjanaṁ hiccādi,
anya-e0806n2:148_2: vajjane sambandhe vattamānehīti vajjanasaṅkhāte sambandhe vatta mānehi apaparīhi,
anya-e0806n2:148_4: kimettha vattabbanti iminā apaparīhi yuttasmāva pañcamībhavane pasiddhattamāha,
anya-e0806n2:148_6: yadatthoti yosālādi attho payojanaṁ yassa vajjanakiriyā rambhassa so yadattho.
anya-e0806n2:150_1: tassa kāriyatthanti tassa mukhyassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:150_4: vinimayeti parivattana nimittaṁ paṭidānecāti ca saddassāṭṭhānappayutti daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n2:152_0: Yadi vajjanakiriyāya sambajjhamānassa kammattā kamme dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:152_2: paṭipadaṁ ujukamevoccāritaṁ vidhānaṁ yassā sā paṭipadavidhānā,
anya-e0806n2:152_4: yajjatra dutiyāvacanaṁ na siyā tadā ritesaddena yoge ujukaṁ vidhīyamānāya pañcamiyā dutiyā bādhīyethāti maññate.
anya-e0806n2:152_5: Yadyatra pañcamiyā dutiyāya bādhābhāvo eva payojanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:152_6: evañcarahi ‘rite vā’ti suttayitabbaṁ evaṁ sati pakkhe dutiyā ca bhavissati,
anya-e0806n2:152_10: āhacca kaṇṭhādiṭṭhāne vāyunāāhanitvā āharitvā vā vacanaṁ āhaccavacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:154_0: Na dutiyāpi yogavibhāgatoti evaṁ maññate “tatiyā ceti vattamāne tattha yadi cakārena ‘dutiyā ce’ti sambandhīyeyya,
anya-e0806n2:154_1: tatrāpi ca kārena pañcamītyevaṁ na kassāpyapakaṁsoti‘vināññatraputhanānāhi tatiyā ce’tyekayogamakatvā
anya-e0806n2:154_2: yogavibhāgasāmatthiyā ‘tatiyā ce’ti ca kārena jātu pañcamī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:154_3: asahāyatthatte sati ‘vinātthe hī’tyevamavatvā kiṁ visuṁ suttaracanāyetyāha-‘bhedo pādānantvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:156_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccattā sambandhassa yatthāti parāmaṭṭhaṁ soti,
anya-e0806n2:156_4: tenāyamādhārīyati kattukamma samavetā kiriyāsmintyadhikaraṇe vā taṁ ādhārayatīti kattari vā ghaṇantena daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:156_5: kattāraṁ kammañca kiriyānissayabhūtamādhāra yatītyādhāroti vā kattari ghaṇa,
anya-e0806n2:159_4: nahyaññatā taddhāraṇaṁ sambhavati tato kiriyā kāraṇenādhāraṇenādhārotya yamevattho,
anya-e0806n2:159_7: nanu yadyapyujukameva kiriyaṁ dhārayati kattā kattusamavāyiniṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_2: kriyāsiddhupakāriti kattukammasamavetāya kiriyāya pasiddhiyaṁ upakārī upakubbantaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_4: kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇenāpyādhāroti sakkā vavatthapetunti codanammanasi nidhāyāha-‘na ce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:162_8: ādheyyena sahopasileso saṁyogalakkhaṇo-ssa atthīti opasilesiko ādhāro-‘kaṭenisīdati thāliyaṁ pacati’tyādo kaṭādi,
anya-e0806n2:162_9: tathāhi devadattasamavetaṁ nisīdanakiriyaṁ kaṭo devadattaṁ dhārayaṁ dhārayati devadattabyavahitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_10: evaṁ thālīpi taṇḍulasamavetaṁ vikledanādikiriyaṁ taṇḍule dhārayaṁ dhārayatītyopasilesikādhārattaṁ kaṭādino.
anya-e0806n2:162_11: Yato-ññatrādheyyaṁ na vattate sabbathā bhiyyo vā,
anya-e0806n2:162_14: yathā cakkhādippavattīnamaññatrābhāvā cakkhādīnaṁ rūpādayo visayāti vuccante,
anya-e0806n2:162_19: dadhimhi sappi,tyatra tilādikaṁ telādikamādheyyaṁ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti tilādi byāpakādhāro.
anya-e0806n2:162_22: yassa samīpadese ādheyyaṁ vattate so evamuccate,
anya-e0806n2:162_24: Nanu cātrāpyādhāre sattamī vidhīyate ādhāro ca nissayo vuccate,
anya-e0806n2:162_26: na ca sissādīnaṁ guruppabhutīti devadattasakunyādīnamiva kaṭākāsādīhi saṁyogo,
anya-e0806n2:162_27: telādīnamiva ca tilādīhi samavāyo vā atthi,
anya-e0806n2:162_30: yadāyattā hi yassa ṭhiti so vināpi saṁyogasamavāyehi tassa nissayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:162_31: tathāhi purisassa na raññā saha saṁyogosamavāyo vātthi,
anya-e0806n2:162_32: atha pana tadadhīnaṭṭhitittā rājanissayo purisoti byapadissīyate,
anya-e0806n2:162_33: sissādīnañca guruppabhutina māyattā ṭhitīti tesamayaṁ tenassāyaṁ (potthake) yuttho te pati gurupabhutīnaṁ
anya-e0806n2:162_37: nāññathā opasilesikena vā opasilesikeva visayābhibyāpakānamaggahaṇato upasilesasse vā upasilesasseva
anya-e0806n2:162_38: paribyattattā tatheva vohāroti na saṅkaro saṅkanīyoti.
anya-e0806n2:166_0: Yassa kiriyāti yassa gavādyatthassa sambandhinī dohanādikiriyā,
anya-e0806n2:168_0: Sāmissarādiyoge chaṭṭhīsattamiyo yathā siyunti “sāmissarādhipatidāyādasakkhipatibhūpasutehi ca “iti (2-3-39) āraddhaṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n2:168_2: atra ca jinindabuddhinā “sāmyādīnaṁ bhedeno pādānaṁ pariyāyantaranivatyatthamiha mā hotu gāmassa rājā”ti
anya-e0806n2:168_11: tatthedaṁ siyā “āsevāyanti vakkhāmī tyavassaṁ vacanamidamārabbhanīyamaññathā īsaṁyuttepi ‘āyutto go sakaṭassā’ti
anya-e0806n2:168_16: Kaccāyanena “kammakaraṇa nimittatthesu sattamī” (2-6-40) “pañcamyatthe ca” (2-6-41) iti ca suttitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:170_6: yathā rukkhassa sākhāti saccametaṁ papañcatthantu vacana”nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:170_15: sutato sakāsā sīlaṁ atisayena seyyoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:170_18: tattha tāva niddhāraṇamevettha natthi kuto chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ tatthappavatti,
anya-e0806n2:170_28: tathā lopantanakkhattasaddā ca tena tena vacanantarena pāṇiniyehi vihitā,
anya-e0806n2:170_29: taṁ sabbaṁ taṁtaṁkārakavacanicchāyameva sādhetuṁ ‘mātari sādhu’ iccādayo udāhaṭā kesesu pasito pasatto,
anya-e0806n2:170_33: phusseninduyuttena lakkhito kālo soyamityabhedena sambandhā phusse,
anya-e0806n2:172_0: Paṭhamātthamatteti ettake vuttepi vākyattho padattho vā na viññāyate nāmaggahaṇānuvattitoti dassetumāha-‘dvedvekānekādi suttato’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:172_1: nāmenāttho paṭipādiyamāno nāmasaṅkhāte-ttani abhidheyyattenājjhāropya paṭipādayatyanapekkhita vibhattivisesanti āha-‘abhidhīyati’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:172_5: idaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti nāmassābhidheyyamatteti iminā idaṁ vakkhamānaṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n2:172_11: tabbantopi saddatthoevāti liṅgādivantopi sarūpā byatiritto saddattho eva,
anya-e0806n2:172_13: taṁyuttassāpi saddatthabhāvato ‘uccaṁ gharāni’tyādīnipi uccattaṁ guṇaṁ nimittaṁ katvā soyamityabhedasambandha gharesu vattantīti.
anya-e0806n2:172_14: Palambate ajjhāgacchatityādo “asaṅkhyehi sabbāsaṁ”ti (2-119) lopavidhānasāmatthiyā pādīhyanatthakehipi paṭhamā siddhāyeva.
anya-e0806n2:179_0: Taṁ yathā bhava rājeti, nippannattho bhaveti ca.
anya-e0806n2:182_1: kiriyāya kārakehi ca nipphāditoti iminā sambandhassa kiriyākārakasambandha pubbakattamāha,
anya-e0806n2:182_2: tatoyevāyaṁ nākasmīkoti na yesaṁkesañci dvinnaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:182_4: kiriyākārakasambandhapubbako hi kārakehi añño sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:185_0: Tattha assutāyaṁ kiriyāyaṁ ‘rañño puriso’ccādo kiriyā kārakasambandhapubbako-ñño eva sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho patīyateti,
anya-e0806n2:185_6: tattha sassāmibhāvavivacchāyaṁ vijjamānopi kiriyākāraka sambandho na vattumicchito,
anya-e0806n2:185_12: idāni sambandhassetassa kiriyākārakasambandhasañjātattaṁ yathāyogamaññatrāpyavagamayituṁ kiñci udāharaṇamāha-‘tathā hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:185_13: paripālanakiriyākato nesaṁ sambandhoti iminā paripālyaparipālanalakkhaṇo-yaṁ sambandhoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:185_14: sā ayampari pālanalakkhaṇā kiriyā sambandhamassedambhāvahetuṁ janayitvā nivattati,
anya-e0806n2:185_15: atthappakaraṇādinā tvimāya kiriyāyāyaṁ sambandhoti viseso vasīyate,
anya-e0806n2:185_18: suyyamāne eva vā kiriyāsadde kārakabhāvassa hetuno vacanicchāyābhāve assedambhābhāvasaṅkhātasseva phalassa
anya-e0806n2:185_19: vattumicchitattā tatheva sambandho jāto chaṭṭhiyābhidhīyate ‘rajjassa saratī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_1: tato pālanādikā upakāra sabhāvā kiriyādvinnampi tesaṁ sambandhinī bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:188_3: tatoyevatassā ubhayasambandhiniyā kiriyāya sambhaveassedanti buddhiyā hetubhūtassa aññamaññāpekkhasabhāvassa
anya-e0806n2:188_7: sambandhi buddhisabbhavassāti sambandhīsu rājapurisādīsu assedanti evampavattāya buddhiyā sabbhavassa.
anya-e0806n2:188_8: Paresaṁ viya “guṇe chaṭṭhī”ti vacanantarābhāve ubhayatthapi (cettha) (yeva) (potthake) chaṭṭhippa- saṅgoti bodhetumāha-‘nanu ce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_9: saccanti yathā vuttaṁ codanamabbhupagamma codakampati yathāvuttaṁ sambandharūpaṁ tato-ññatrāpyupasaṁ
anya-e0806n2:188_11: atheva miccādināsatīpiaññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇe sambandhe vacanicchāyevettha kāraṇanti codakādhippāyamatropanetvā
anya-e0806n2:188_14: evaṁ vattabbanti evaṁ yadipiccādinā vakkhamānanayena vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:188_15: paṭipādetabbatāyātyādinā idandīpeti “visessaṁ vidheyatāya na parādhīnanti appadhānabhāvato byatiriccate tato-ttaniṭṭhameva,
anya-e0806n2:188_20: ekassa sambandhittāsambhavā vatthuto dviṭṭho visesanagatattena patīyate tato chaṭṭhī visesanamevānudhāvati patītivisaye saddappavattī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_21: yo hi vikappanaṁ visayo so saddānanti,
anya-e0806n2:188_23: vatthuto dviṭṭhassāpi taggatattena patītiyā yathā bhātūnaṁ dhananti,
anya-e0806n2:188_25: tathā satyapi visessa bhede visesanagatameva bhedamanu(vidadhā)ti ‘devadattassa assā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_27: visessagatattenāpi tappatītiyaṁ niyamena taggatabhedānuvidhānaṁ siyā visesanagatabhedānuvidhānamiva,
anya-e0806n2:188_29: vattupaṭibaddhameva ca dviṭṭhattaṁ manasikatvā taṁvādīhi dviṭṭho sambandhobhidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:188_37: yadā tu na visessapavatti tadā byatiriccateva ‘nīlassa guṇassa uppalannissayo’ti kārakabhāvalakkhaṇā padhānabhāvā byatiriccate eva nīlādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_39: tato vise- sanaṁ kiñcideva kārakarūpato padhānabhāvā byatiriccateti visesana mattenāpi sesaṁ sabbaṁ tathā siyāti nāsaṅkanīyanti.
anya-e0806n2:189_2: Sahayuttampaṭicca evanti iminā purisassa appadhānattameva dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:189_7: aññe tu saraṇassa kiriyārūpattā kiriyantaramantareneva dabbena sambandhopapattimāhuyathā dvinnaṁ jatukato saṁsileso,
anya-e0806n2:189_10: Paresaṁ tatiyatthe dutiyatthe ca kitakappayoge ññatrāpi (pañcamyatthe) sattamyatthe ca (“chaṭṭhī cā”)
anya-e0806n2:189_11: ti (2-6-20) dutiyā pañcamīnañcā”ti (2-6-29) ca suttantarehi chaṭṭhītimatā,
anya-e0806n2:189_13: etthāpyādo udāharaṇadvaye suttantaramantarena sampadānattābhāvā sambandhavacanicchāyameva paresampi chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n2:189_17: pañcamyatthe pana vatticchātova sabbe tasanti daṇḍassātyādīni udāharaṇāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0806n2:191_0: Anabhimatāti ‘tulyatthehyatulopamāhi tatiyāññatarissa’nti (2-3-72) suttena tulopamāhi aññehi tulyatthehi
anya-e0806n2:191_2: yasmā sadisā bhāvā tesaṁ nopamāti ‘ajjunassa tulā natthī’tyādikamuccate,
anya-e0806n2:191_3: tasmā evaṁ yathāvuttanayenāti tadevantīmassa attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:193_9: na pubbalopopi āgamappayogānukūlyenātipi sakkā vattunti āha-‘nacā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:193_10: niccamparalopoyevāti na ca sakkā mantunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:193_13: jhissākāravidhānaṁ “yosu jhissa pume”ti (2-93) etadevapayojanantiādinā vuttappayojanābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘aniṭṭhattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:193_18: jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭetivāti “jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti suttaṁ vā,
anya-e0806n2:195_2: tena hi bahuvacane bahuvacanena (potthake) paṭhamādutiyāsu ‘aṭṭhīnī’ti ekameva rūpamudāhaṭanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:197_1: asati hi ñakāre‘ñānubandho’ti ñakārena visesanena sukāro na visesī yeyya satiyeva tasmiṁ tena so visesīyeyya,
anya-e0806n2:197_2: tasmā “ñakānubandhādyantā”ti sutte ‘ñakānubandhā’ti visesanaṁ visesanabhāvo attho payojanaṁ yassa so visesanattho,
anya-e0806n2:197_8: tassā-ññapadatthabhūtassāpi attā attho payojanambhavati nimittabhāvenāti nātthabhedoti ta eta imavajjitānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:197_9: sabbādīnanti ta etaimasaddehi eva vajjitānamaññesaṁ sabbādīnaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:197_10: paṭisiddhesupi kassaci ādeso dissatīti dassetumāha‘tasaddassa cā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:201_0: Ghapasaññehīti idaṁ tetimāmūhi tīmassa aññapadatthasamāsena vā visesanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:203_0: “Āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsā vacanametaṁ tattha tagguṇībhūtāti tasmiṁ āgamimhi guṇībhūtā,
anya-e0806n2:203_2: taggahaṇenāti āgamiggahaṇena taggahaṇena gahaṇatoti āgamibhūtassa naṁ iccassa gahaṇena gahaṇato,
anya-e0806n2:204_3: “namhi ticatunnamitthiyaṁ tissa catassā”ti (2-20) tissādeso “namhi nuka dvādīnaṁ sattarasanna”nti (2-47) nuka,
anya-e0806n2:206_3: sutte pana satīti “suña sassā”ti sutte sati.
anya-e0806n2:208_0: Ratti ca ādi ca ratyādayo, tehi.
anya-e0806n2:212_0: Tenāti yato ltuiti visesanattena vattumicchitassa paccayassa gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:212_7: so kriyattho ādi yassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n2:212_8: so paccayo-nto yassa samudāyassa so tadanto,
anya-e0806n2:212_11: nanu ca ‘ltvī’ti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadantassa gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:212_12: paccayaggahaṇena pana tadādino gahaṇaṁ kathaṁ siyā vacanābhāvātyāha-‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:212_14: tena vinā na bhavati sīlenāti tadavinābhāvī,
anya-e0806n2:212_16: “Paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyassa yattha paccayaggahaṇaṁ tattha sādhāraṇattā ‘tadādino’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:212_17: tadādisamudāyassa gahaṇe panettha viseso na dissati…
anya-e0806n2:212_19: ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te” tyatra (5-4) tu dissati viseso,
anya-e0806n2:212_20: vakkhatihi tattha “tuṁtāyetave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṁ tadatthāya”nti (5-61) tuṁpaccayaṁ vakkhati”ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:214_1: pakkhe dīghavidhānenevāti iminā akārādese kate pakkhe dīghavidhāneneva,
anya-e0806n2:214_2: aññatthacaritatthatāyāti ltvantādito aññattha bhopurisā bhopurisaiccādo jātipadatthanissayanena katatthatāya,
anya-e0806n2:216_3: tathā bho brahmāti ettha tathāti iminā brahmātirūpassa niruttiyaṁ niddiṭṭhattāva ettha saṅgahitabhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:216_4: Evaṁ vivarantīti tasmā sa sakhato gassa akāraākārā”tiādinā evaṁ vivaranti,
anya-e0806n2:216_5: te hi aca āca ica īca ecāti dvande pubbasarānaṁ lopaṁ katvā ettupasilesaniddesaṁ vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n2:216_7: kimatthanti kiṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa taṁ kimatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:216_8: Sāmaññavidhānaṁ kimatthampanevaṁ payojanāsaṅkāyaṁ payojanāsaṅkāvicāraṇaṁ manasi nidhāya ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttattā āha–
anya-e0806n2:216_12: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘āgatigaṇoyanti iminā tadākārasaṅkhātajātippadhānagaṇattappakāsanena yadi sambodhane
anya-e0806n2:216_13: ekārantākārantalābhīnaṁ kattu isi sakha muni bhadantādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ payojanaṁ na siyā,
anya-e0806n2:216_14: aññathā anupapajjanaṁ siyāti evamaññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato sāmaññavidhāne payojanamāhe”ti,
anya-e0806n2:216_15: soyanti iminā vuttiyaṁ ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttaṁ vacanaṁ nidasseti.
anya-e0806n2:218_0: Ssañca ssāca ssāyoca añca tiñcāti itarītarayoge cattha samāso,ssaṁ ssā ssāyaṁ tiṁsu.
anya-e0806n2:220_2: sāmaññavidhānatoti kassaci liṅgassa aparāmāsā sāmaññena vidhānato,
anya-e0806n2:220_12: tappaṭisedhābhāvā’daṇḍi kula’nti rassattaṁ ‘sismiṁ napuṁsake’ti vidhisuttaṁ vadeyyā”ti,
anya-e0806n2:220_15: ettha pana napuṁsake ekavacanantaṁ daṇḍi kulanti vakkhamānattā nodāhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:220_16: yosu pana “yolopanisudīgho”ti (2-88) adīghassāpi dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā paṭhamameva dīghassa rassābhāvekāva kathāti nodāhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:220_19: ettha vijjamāne ge pare okārantassa vā rassāpajjanadosampasaṅgato nossā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:222_0: Gāvena gavenāti karaṇepi samānaṁ, gāvassa gavassāti chaṭṭhiyāpi.
anya-e0806n2:224_0: Senāti sutattā seiti vuttiyaṁ nimittaṁ parikappitaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:226_0: Saddantarattena koci dosoti sambandho, ādisitabbā ādesā kātabbā.
anya-e0806n2:228_0: Pena pasaññāya yuttā īpī, paca so īcāti vāpī abhedaggahaṇena, aññassāti ikāra ukāraūkārassa.
anya-e0806n2:230_0: Loke devadatto dattoti ekadesena samudāyavohāra dassanato sminotīmassa smiṁ vacanassātyayamattho dassitotyāha-‘smiti iminā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n2:232_0: Brahmādīsu ‘ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho’ti pāṭhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:234_0: So bhasmā anto yassa so tadanto samudāyo, tassa,
anya-e0806n2:242_0: Ṭamuttapakkhoti asantaṁ kubbantassāti ṭādesena muttapakkho,ntussacevanti pasiddhattāva ṭādesamuttapakkhaṁ upameti,
anya-e0806n2:244_0: Ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti kasmā vuttaṁ nanu tadantassa samudāyassa patte “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti (1-17) antasseva hoti,
anya-e0806n2:244_3: tathāpi ‘jhissā’ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyatte issāti vuttatta vuttanthi sāmatthiyato tadantassa ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti tathā vuttanti,
anya-e0806n2:244_5: tathāpi yadi samudāyassa ṭādeso-bhimato siyā ‘tathā sati kiṁ jhaggahaṇena issatveva vadeyyāti nātippasajjatīti,
anya-e0806n2:244_6: jhaggahaṇe nāmante ikārasseva jhasaññattāti idaṁ pana visesanattena vattu manicchite yujjati.
anya-e0806n2:248_0: Hetukurusaddehi yosu iminā ṭādese “lopo”tīminā yolope vā sampatte “paccayanissitaṁ bahiraṅga”nti yolopato
anya-e0806n2:250_1: na tu sabbasaddo saddasse (potthake) tyāha-‘avayavene’tyādi,yadipi ‘sabba saddo ādi yesa’nti avayavena viggaho,
anya-e0806n2:250_5: ko bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ bahunnaṁ vā eko deva datto kaṭhādīhi vā atthe dvīhi bahūhi vā ekassa niddhāraṇe
anya-e0806n2:250_6: sati kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamesu ṇādivuttiyaṁ “ekatthatāya”nti (2-119) vibhattilope “rānubandhentasarādissā”ti
anya-e0806n2:250_8: ubho aṁsā assāti atthe “ayubhadvitīhaṁse”ti (4-49) aye“saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) saralope rūpasiddhīti āha-‘ubho aṁsā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_12: sābhidheyyā pekkhāti ettha so sako abhidheyyo attho disādi sābhidheyyoti gahitoti āha-‘pubbādīna’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_13: sābhidheyyanti kammato parā apapubbā ‘ikkha=dassane’tīmasmā “kvacaṇa”iti (5-41) aṇpaccaye sābhidheyyāpekkho,
anya-e0806n2:250_16: ettha ca parādisaddābhidheyyo-ttho disādesādi pubbādisaddābhidheyyassātthassa disāya desādino vāvadhibhāvena niyamavasena pavattati,
anya-e0806n2:250_18: socāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavatto pubbādisaddavacanīyaṁ disādesādi mapekkhatīti sābhidheyyāpekkhovadhiniyamoyeva vavatthāti vuccatītyayamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:250_21: kosallena nimittenāti kusala saddassa pavattinimittena kosallena,
anya-e0806n2:250_23: ‘nāññañca nāmappadhānā”ti (2-136) aneneva saññāyaṁ sabbādikāriyassa nisiddhatte kimasaññāyaṁbhyanenetyāha ‘nāññañce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_24: kiñci pubbattādikamuddissa kesañci pubboparotyādikā atthānugatā saññā anvatthasaññā.
anya-e0806n2:252_1: yuttatā cāssa pāṭhe byabhicāra dassanatoti vattumāha-‘napuṁsake’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:252_3: vikappānuvattiyā anapuṁsakamidameva vacanaṁ tassa kvaci byabhicāratte ñāpakanti vattumāha-‘tassa cā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:252_5: aññathā yathāvaṭṭhitapāṭhānukkamenātthaggahaṇe sati suttassa suttassā (potthake) mukhyattappatītito kathantamaññassa ñāpakaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n2:254_0: Nanu ca “lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttesu paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇa”ntīmāya paribhāsāya lakkhaṇikassākārassa gahaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n2:254_10: kevalaṁ lakkhaṇadassanenāsmiṁ lakkhaṇe satyavassamanena rūpena bhavitabbanti lakkhaṇena paṭipāditaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_14: tasmiṁ lakkhaṇavutte paṭipadavutte ca rūpe sati paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_17: so ca niyamo aniyamapubbake sandehe satyavatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n2:254_24: yatra dve rūpāni sambhavanti tatrevā yamparibhāsā sandehāpākaraṇamukhena pavattāti ñāyappattoyevā mattho imāya paribhāsāyānuvādyate,
anya-e0806n2:254_26: tathāpi lakkhaṇavuttaṁ rūpaṁ lakkhaṇe nonnīyamānaṁ dhūmaggi viya jalabalākā viya cānu mānikaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_29: paccakkhānumānesu ca paccakkhambalavantaraṁ pamāṇanti ato paṭipadavuttameva gayhatīti.
anya-e0806n2:258_6: aṅge bhavamantaraṅgaṁ vibhatthyatthe-saṅkhyasamāso “eonama vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) attaṁ rāgamo,
anya-e0806n2:258_7: aṅgato bahi bahiraṅgaṁ “payyapābahitiro purepacchā vā pañcamyā”ti (3-5) asaṅkhyasamāso,
anya-e0806n2:258_11: kintu bahiraṅganissitaṁ kāriyambahiraṅgaṁ yathā mañcanissitesu saddāyantesu ‘mañcā saddāyantī’tyuccate
anya-e0806n2:258_12: taṁ viyeti atoyevā saṅkhyasamāsepi liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo ‘antaraṅgo antaraṅgā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:258_16: kate paccakkha ñāṇassākkhanissitattañāpanatthaṁ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhya samāso,
anya-e0806n2:258_18: tathevāya-mantaraṅganissito-yaṁ samudāyanissitoti ñāpanatthaṁ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhyasamāsoti liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo na virujjhate,
anya-e0806n2:258_22: Antaraṅga kāriyassa balavattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyattā’tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_23: idampana antaraṅgakāriyassa balavabhāvasādhane kāraṇaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:258_24: antaraṅgattā balavabhāvoyeva hi sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyatta kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_25: tathā cāha-‘yo lopato akārassa paṭhamameva bhavane kāraṇamāha antaraṅgattā akārassā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:258_27: antaraṅgabalavabhāvasādhanassa pana lokato icchitattā ayamevatthe pāṭho ghaṭate”antaraṅgameva kāriyambalavaṁ loke tathādiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n2:258_29: loke tathādiṭṭhattāti antaraṅgabalavabhāvassa loke evaṁ vakkhamānanayena diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n2:258_30: athavā kenaci vidhurappaccayopanipātena kāraṇave kallena vā kadāci kattumasakkuṇeyyattepi antaraṅgassa
anya-e0806n2:260_0: Ivaṇṇassāti vuttattāti ‘ye passivaṇṇassā”ti ettha ivaṇṇassāti vuttattā.
anya-e0806n2:262_2: ekānekesūti vuttattā saṅkhyāvisese vidhīyamānāsyādayo kathamasaṅkhyehi uppajjitumussahante iccāsayenāha- ‘kathamasaṅkhyehi syādīnaṁ sambhavo’ti.
anya-e0806n2:262_3: Atha nissaṅkhyehi hotusyādīnamasambhavo uccaṁ rukkhassiccādotu saṅkhyāsambhave bhavitabbameva syādīhiccāha-‘saṅkhyāsambhaveve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:262_5: kimesamuppattiyampayojanaṁ yenāsaṅkhyehi taduppatti no-numīyate ccāsaṅkiyāha-‘tassañca satiya’ntyādi,
anya-e0806n2:262_6: asati hi syādīnamuppattiyamuccamādīnamasaṅkhyānampadattaṁ natthīti yo ādīsu padasmā paresaṁ tumhāmhasaddānaṁ
anya-e0806n2:262_7: savibhattīnaṁ vonoādikaṁ padanimittaṁ kāriyaṁ na siyāti ‘uccaṁ vo,
anya-e0806n2:262_9: sati tu syāduppattiyaṁ luttesupi tesu padattanipphattiyāyeva taduppattito padatte siddhe padalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ sijjhatevāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n2:262_10: Parehi ettha ‘tassaṁ sālāya’nti vacanicchāyaṁ ‘tatra sālāya’nti yathā siyāti “abyayatvā syādino”ti (pā,
anya-e0806n2:262_14: Atha kenātra āppaccayo vidhīyate yenāssāpi lopo-nusāsīyate “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) ce netadatthi,
anya-e0806n2:262_16: tasmā asaṅkhyehi āppaccayassa sambhavoyeva natthītyanatthakamāppaccayassa lopavacananti nānatthakaṁ itthiyanti
anya-e0806n2:262_17: (3-26) hi guṇippadhāno niddeso itthattavati āppaccayādayo vidhīyante ‘tassaṁ sālāya (micce tasmiṁ padatthe)
anya-e0806n2:262_19: tasmā siyāye vetasmā āppaccayotyavassamāppaccayassa lopo vidheyyoti yo maññate,
anya-e0806n2:262_22: itthiyanti niddesassa guṇippadhānattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘itthattavati hi āppaccayādayo’tiāha,
anya-e0806n2:262_30: padattho ca itthattaṁ siyāti yopyāheti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:262_35: evaṁ sati sālāyamiccādisaddantarāpekkhā itthattappatīti tatretyādīsu siyāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:262_39: aviddasu ayanti ubhayatrāpyatrekavacanasissa nivattiyā kataṁ yamekattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:262_41: itthatta vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ tatretyetassāti etāvatā āppaccayo uppajjatīti ca na
anya-e0806n2:264_1: ekottho yassa pakatyādisamudāyassa so ekattho ‘assa cekatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ īyādi vidhānantyāha- ‘ekatthatā īyādividhāna’nti,
anya-e0806n2:266_0: Yadā cātrādhisaddappayogo tadā teneva vibhatyatthassa vuttattā na sattamī payujjate,
anya-e0806n2:266_3: tenā sakapadeneva viggaho evaṁ dassanīyoti āha- ‘itthīsu kathā pavattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_3: Aññatra vidhīyamāno-yamamādeso pañcamiyampaṭisiddhattā pañcamiyā paṭisedhena sayampi paṭisiddho nāma hotītyāha ‘ādesassevāyaṁ paṭisedho’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_4: lopapaṭisedhassa ‘nāto’ti pubbavākyena vuttassa ayampaṭisedho neti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:268_5: atha kathamidamapañcamyātyamādesenevātisambandhati na lopa paṭisedhenāti paribhāsamāha-‘anantarassa vidhi vā hoti paṭisedho vā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_7: antarāḷamattapaṭisedhe payojanaṁ natthītyantarāḷagatassa vidhino paṭisedhassa cābhāvānantarotyupa carīyate anantarā gāmātyādi viya,
anya-e0806n2:268_8: diṭṭhatte pana majjhassa na vijjate-ntara mesanti viggahe suttepyanantarassa vidhānantarassāpi diṭṭhattā dvinnamekopyanantarotyuccate,
anya-e0806n2:268_15: sāmatthiyāladdhanti dvinnamatthānaṁ vidhānāya dve vākyāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n2:268_20: tathāsatyamapañcamiyātidaṁ vākyaṁ yadi na visesatthamālambate tamantarenānupapattito-ññathā kintyanenātthabalena laddhanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:268_23: na ekavākyattenāti byatireko ekavākyatāyañhi kāriya dvayassapi pañcamiyampaṭisedho siyā ‘pañcamiṁ vajjetvā taṁ kāriyadvayaṁ veditabba’nti,
anya-e0806n2:268_27: kimatthamihāyaṁ paribhāsā paṭhyate iha satthe-pavādā ussagge bādhanteti niyamo,
anya-e0806n2:268_28: tatra cussaggā duvidhā niyatappattayo aniyatappattayo ceti,
anya-e0806n2:268_40: yena ussaggena nāppatte patteeva samphuṭṭheeva visayetyattho…
anya-e0806n2:269_3: yena tvappatte visaye ārabbhate tassa bādhanaṁ na bhavatītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:269_5: tathāhi yadi ussaggena sabbo visayo gahito siyā,
anya-e0806n2:269_7: tasmā anavakāsattā (na) apa (vāde) pana tassa bādhanambhavatītyavaseyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:269_9: tampati sāvakā sattā tambādhateti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:269_10: ‘pañcapūlimānaye’tyatra pañcannaṁ pūlānaṁ samāhāroti visesanasamāso “nadāditovī” (3-27) samāharaṇaṁ samāhāroti
anya-e0806n2:271_3: tattha liṅgena sutte niddiṭṭhato aññena kenaci visiṭṭhaṁ nāmaṁ liṅgavisiṭṭhaṁ, tassa,
anya-e0806n2:271_9: so itthiyampattiyaṁ sati anitthiyanti kato siyāti anitthiyanti paṭisedhavacanamevemaṁ paribhāsaṁ ñāpetīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:273_0: Anapuṁsakassāti pariyudāsoti anapuṁsakassāti ettha nañsaddassa pariyudāso-tthotyattho.
anya-e0806n2:277_1: simhi tu kappaccayā paṭhamameva kato massa sādesoti tappaccaye sati ‘kevā’ti kiṁ sāmaññena sādesavidhānene
anya-e0806n2:277_2: tyāsaṅkiya suttassa sāmañña vidhāne phalaṁ dassetuṁ ‘kenekatthatāyaṁ’tyādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:277_4: pubbabhāgassāti asubhāgassa padattābhāvāti “ekatthatāyā”ti (2-119) vibhattiyā padattasādhikāyāpagamena padattābhāvā,
anya-e0806n2:277_12: nimittassābhāve taṁ hetuto pavattassa nemittikassa phalassāpyabhāvo bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:277_15: tathehāpi nimittato pavattānaṁ nimittābhāve abhāvoyeva yutti māti maññate,
anya-e0806n2:281_1: “tadādesā te viya hontī”ti paribhāsato sādyādesīnaṁ gahaṇāssāyādesādīnaṁ gahaṇasambhavepi kiṁ ssāyādiggahaṇe
anya-e0806n2:282_0: Desino ādeso tadādeso, tassa, tassa ādesino gahaṇaṁ taggahaṇaṁ, tena.
anya-e0806n2:284_0: Aññathāti guruniddesamakatvā aññena lahuppakārena niddisane sati,
anya-e0806n2:284_2: aññathātiādinā nekadesotivacanapariyantenetena ‘na tvekavibhattiyuttāna’nti paribhāsekadesassa adhippāyo pakāsitoti ñātabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:286_1: aññathā hi sabbādiggahaṇe ko pasaṅgo piyasabbādīnaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:288_6: ettha tu māsena karaṇabhūtena pubbabhūtānanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:290_2: cattho ettha sambhavati kintu sabbādi na catthasamāsavisayoti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:292_0: Kiṁ bahulaṁvidhānā ‘vuddhyabhāvo’ otthābhāvo (pañcikāyaṁ) ti pāṭhena payojanaṁ yene tadatthameva “sumedhādīnamavuddhi ce”ti gaṇapāṭho kato,
anya-e0806n2:292_5: bāṇādīsu abhidheyyesu manādīsu na paṭṭhīyantīti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:292_7: ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavā ahasaddo manādīsu na daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:292_8: rahasīti nipātattā ikārassa ca asabbhavā rahasaddo ca manādīsu na daṭṭhabboti sajjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:292_9: ikārassa kaccāyane smino karīyamānassa ikārādesassa ca,
anya-e0806n2:292_12: tenāti yena ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavo rahasītica nipāto, tena,
anya-e0806n2:296_4: sutattāti sotaviññāṇena gahitattā paccakkhattāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:296_5: anumitassa “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti (1-26) liṅgato tadantasaṅkhāta atthadassanasaṅkhātaanumānaññāṇena viññātassāti attho.
anya-e0806n2:298_0: Daḷho dhammo dhanu assa daḷhadhammā. Rājādīsvimappaccaye paṭhite
anya-e0806n2:299_0: Tadanto paccayaggahaṇa paribhāsāya gayhatī tyāha- ‘iminā iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:301_0: Paccayaiccādinā “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:301_1: tattha yato vihito taṁ vinā na bhavati paccayotyanena ñāyena pattoyevāttho ākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito,
anya-e0806n2:301_4: so pakativiseso ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n2:301_5: so paccayo-nte yassa samudāyassa so tadanto,
anya-e0806n2:301_8: iha tu tadantaggahaṇamevānurūpanti’ dassetumāha-“kattari ltuṇakā”ti iminā tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:301_9: tadāditadanta samudāyassa tu gahaṇe phalaṁ ‘byajigisī’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:301_10: tañca “tuṁsmā lopocicchāyaṁ te”ti (5-4) sutte sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0806n2:303_2: ltvanto mandhātusaddo atthīti ‘sakamandhātu’ saddopi ltvantoti sajjhāhāro padasambandho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:305_1: tathāpi saṅkhyānadvārenidhasaṅkhyeyye vattatītyāha-‘cuddasahi saṅkhyāhī’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:309_0: Dutiyāggahaṇenāti ‘dutiyāyossa ne vā’tyevaṁ sutta racanāyaṁ dutiyāggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n2:313_2: itthipumannapuṁsaka samūhoti etthāyantesaṁ sādhanakkamo ‘dvandachaṭṭhīhi samāse itthipumanapuṁsakasamūho’ti
anya-e0806n2:313_3: ṭhite “samāse ca vibhāsā”ti (2-2-35) pumantassa amādese “vaggantaṁ vā vagge”ti (1-42) niggahītassa vagganto.
anya-e0806n2:315_0: Kammādittā enassāpi abhāvapakkheti “nā sse no”ti (2-80) kammādito nāssa enādesakaraṇato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:317_4: kiñcarahi ekassābhidheyyassa pubbasaddena paṭipāditassa dutiyampatipādanamanvādesoti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:319_0: Navirujjhatīti iminā “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) sāmaññena vidhānato syādyantamajjhepi itthiyampaccayo navirujjhatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n2:321_1: tathāsati ‘dvinnaṁ saddānaṁ dveādesā kamene’cceva kasmā vuttaṁ tyāsaṅkiyāha ‘na naṁvibhattikkamenāpī’ti.
anya-e0806n2:321_6: evamaññate “kiñcāpi jātiniddesena dvepi naṁ rūpāni gayhanti,
anya-e0806n2:323_1: tathā sati kāriyittena tadantāva gayhanti kathaṁ ntantūyevā tyāsaṅkiyāha- teyeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:325_3: Ekekasmiṁ yomhi dvinnaṁ ādesānaṁ sambhavā ādesīnampi bahuttasambhavoti sutte ‘dvinna’nti bahuvacananiddeso,
anya-e0806n2:325_4: vuttiyampana paccekaṁ yomhi paccekaṁ dvisaddasambhavā ‘dvissā’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:327_0: Pakatavasenāti tumhāmhānamādesānamadhikatavasena, kamamanatikkamma na bhavantīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:329_0: Kaccāyanācariyo tumhāmhehi parāya catutthī chaṭṭhī savibhattiyā “sassaṁ”ti (2-3-3) suttena amādesaṁ vidhāya ‘tumhaṁ amha’nti bahuvacanarūpāni sādheti…
anya-e0806n2:329_1: ekasmimpi attani guruādike ca gārava vasena bahuvacanarūpadassanatoti dassetumāha-tumhaṁ amha’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n2:329_3: imasmimpana satthe ekasmimpi sabbathā bahuvacana rūpasādhanakkamaṁ dassetuṁ ‘idha panā’tiādimāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:331_1: padasaññāvidhāya kavacanābhāvepīti pāṇini yānamiva syādityādyantānaṁ padasaññāvidhāyakassa suttassa abhāvepi,
anya-e0806n2:331_2: anvatthavasena padanti gayhamāne atippasaṅgopi siyāti āha-‘ruḷhiyāvātippasaṅgā bhāvo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:331_5: taṁ sabbaṁ ekato saṅgahetvā ‘padasamūho vākya’nti vuttikārena vuttanti dassetumāha- ‘sābyaye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:331_8: ākhyātaṁ sābyayaṁ sakārakaṁ savisesanañca vākyesaññaṁ bhavatītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:331_9: visesananti kārakavisesanassa kiriyā visesanassa ca sāmaññena gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:331_16: padasamūho vākyanti vutte ayampi adhippāyavisesovasīyatīti vattumāha-vattu’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:331_17: yatheccādinā anekākhyāti kampi guṇappadhānabhāve nopakārato vākyamekambhavati…
anya-e0806n2:333_1: tumhehi puññaṁ pasutaṁ anappakanti gāthāpāde tumhehitiādisū tattā na voādeso,
anya-e0806n2:333_2: tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagareti pubbavākyato vākyantarattā ekavākyatā natthi,
anya-e0806n2:333_3: tumhe viya diya dissanti amhe viya dissantīti viggayha ‘disa-pekkhaṇe’ iccasmā “samānaññabhavantayādi
anya-e0806n2:333_4: tūpamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā”ti (5-43) kappaccaye “nate kānubandhanāgamesū”ti (5-85) ettābhāve “syādisyādinekattha”nti
anya-e0806n2:335_0: Pacchā ādeso anvādesoti gahite kathitānukathananti kathaṁ ñāyatīti āha- ‘pacchā kathanañca kathitāpekkhanti katvā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:337_0: Saha vijjamāno pubbo yassa so sapubbo.
anya-e0806n2:341_4: asatte sampatteti idaṁ “āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā”ti (2-239) suttassa sāmaññatā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:341_5: sāmaññavacanassa paṭisedhoti iminā visesavacane jaṭilakaiccatra ‘āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā”tīmassa pattindasseti,
anya-e0806n2:341_8: tasmiṁ devadattādisāmaññavacane māṇavake māṇavakasadde parabhūte sati,
anya-e0806n2:341_9: ubhinnampi asatteti iminā idaṁ dīpeti “devadattāti visesavacanattā paṭisedhābhāvā pubbaparānamubhinnampi “āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā”tīdaṁ pappotī”ti.
